title: Butterfly
description: When an injury tears her ballet dreams away from her, Brooke becomes withdrawn and depressed. She spends a great deal of time alone as she attempts to recalculate her life plan. It isn't until her unlikely friendship with quirky Miss Cee Cee that Brooke begins to realize that beneath the surface of dreams lies adventure, mystery, romance and more than just a touch of danger.
author: Jodi Bullock
